briefTitle: TRI102 in the Treatment of Children With Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
officialTitle: TRI102 in the Treatment of Children With Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHA): A Laboratory Classroom Study
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether TRI102 is effective in the treatment of Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) in children ages 6-12.

primaryOutcome.measure: SKAMP (Swanson, Kotkin, Agler, M-Flynn, and Pelham Scale)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Absolute change from baseline in SKAMP-C score from baseline to 4 hours after dose
